data.text: Accident just happened along Enugu-Onitsha expressway. 3 cars involved. Traffic dey mad. #Enugu #NigeriaRoads
Police checkpoint again at Ore-Benin road. Dem dey delay everybody, collecting ₦200 per motor. Smh. #Ore #Roads
Rain just fall heavy near Nsukka, road don flood. Small cars no fit pass. Drive safe. #Nsukka #TravelAlert
Tank truck fall for Aba road, Port Harcourt. Fuel dey leak, fire risk dey high. #PHC #RoadSafety
Serious traffic along Owerri to Onitsha road. Trailer don block half lane. E no dey move at all. #Owerri #Onitsha
Just sighted armed robbery incident reported near Lokoja-Abuja road. Please avoid if possible. #Abuja #SecurityAlert
Bad potholes don scatter Umuahia road. 3 keke don break down for same spot. Govt abeg fix am. #Umuahia
Flood for Niger Bridge Onitsha, motorists dey stuck. Some cars don soak. #Onitsha #FloodAlert
Okada accident just now at Ikeja underbridge. Rider seriously injured. #Lagos #Ikeja
Checkpoint at Nyanya again this morning. Soldiers dey search buses one by one. Traffic build up. #Abuja
Fire accident at Egbu road Owerri, tanker burn. Traffic blocked totally. #Owerri #FireAlert
Major protest by students at UNN gate. Vehicles can’t enter campus road. #Nsukka #Protest
Heavy accident on Sagamu-Ibadan expressway. Multiple casualties. Road blocked. #Ibadan #Accident
Container fall for Asa Road Aba. People dey gather but road blocked. #Aba #Traffic
Landslide reported along Jos-Bauchi road after heavy rainfall. Avoid the area. #Jos #Bauchi
Third Mainland Bridge traffic standstill. Accident involving danfo bus. #LagosTraffic
Armed youths block Benin-Auchi road, protesting power outage. No cars dey pass. #Benin
Bridge collapse scare at Nekede road Owerri. Cars still dey pass but e dey shake. #Owerri #Roads
Military roadblock at Maiduguri-Damaturu highway. Movement restricted. #Maiduguri
Serious flood don cover parts of Asaba-Onitsha road. Cars dey turn back. #Asaba #Onitsha
Big traffic jam at Airport Road Abuja, trailer spoil for middle lane. Avoid if you can. #AbujaTraffic
Flood near Marian Road, Calabar. People waka inside water reach knee level. #CalabarFlood
Serious armed robbery incident reported at Okigwe-Umuahia road. Drivers turning back. #Okigwe #Security
Bridge collapse scare at Dugbe, Ibadan. Cars stuck, traffic everywhere. #Ibadan
Heavy protest along Ring Road, Benin. Youths block road, burn tires. No movement. #Benin
Fatal accident on Yola-Mubi road. Bus somersaulted. Multiple casualties feared. #Yola #Accident
Lagos-Ibadan expressway jammed. Tanker break down at Magboro. 2 hours delay. #LagosTraffic
Explosion reported at Maiduguri-Damboa road. Security agencies on ground. #Maiduguri
Students protest at University of Benin gate. Blocking Ugbowo road. Cars no pass. #UNIBEN
Flooding again at Effurun roundabout Warri. Traffik jam don start. #Warri
Trailer brake failure at Nkwo Nnewi market junction. Serious accident. #Nnewi
Protest along Bukuru road, Jos. Youths block road with stones. #Jos
Heavy traffic at Holy Ghost Park Enugu. Accident between bus and keke. #EnuguTraffic
Armed herdsmen spotted along Ore-Ondo road. Travelers turning back. #Ondo
Serious hold-up at Kaduna-Zaria expressway. Military checkpoint dey slow cars. #Kaduna
Fuel tanker fell at Control Post Owerri. Fire service just arrived. #Owerri
Bridge washed away after heavy rain at Ilorin-Jebba road. No passage. #Ilorin
Protesters block Ado-Ekiti road over new levies. Cars stranded. #Ekiti
Fatal crash along Zuba express Abuja. FRSC on site. Road blocked. #Abuja
Okigwe road blocked by flood. Vehicles stuck. #ImoState
Massive hold-up at Nyanya axis, Abuja. Trailer spoil for road. #AbujaTraffic
Heavy rainfall don scatter road near Summit junction Asaba. Flood dey everywhere. #Asaba
Accident involving a Hilux and Okada along Bauchi-Jos road. Avoid that route. #Bauchi
Obosi junction Onitsha blocked by traders protest. Cars stranded. #Onitsha
Flood cut off road to Usmanu Danfodiyo University, Sokoto. #Sokoto
Gas explosion at Ikot Ekpene Road, Uyo. Houses affected. #Uyo
Serious accident along Ogbomoso-Ilorin road. Tanker and bus involved. #Kwara
Apapa Wharf road blocked. Trucks line up to the port. #LagosTraffic
Kaduna-Zaria road blocked by accident near Sabon Gari. #Zaria
Rainfall cause landslide along Riyom road in Jos. Cars diverted. #Jos
Security checkpoint delay along Baga road Maiduguri. Movement slow. #Maiduguri
Okada riders protest at Mokola roundabout, Ibadan. Road blocked. #Ibadan
Accident at Ikpa road Uyo, car jam keke. #Uyo
Flood take over Ada George road Port Harcourt. #PortHarcourt
Accident involving tanker at Jebba bridge Kwara. Road closed. #Kwara
Massive traffic along Abakpa Nike road Enugu. Trailer stuck. #Enugu
Youth protest along Douglas Road Owerri. Burning tires. #Owerri
Bridge collapse cut off Jalingo-Wukari road in Taraba. #Taraba
Accident along Minna-Bida road. Multiple vehicles. #Minna
Heavy rainfall cause flooding near Ekiosa market Benin. #Benin
Armed robbery incident at Ore-Benin road, travelers stranded. #Ondo
Oshodi traffic mad this morning. Danfo and trailer accident. #Lagos
Flooding at Ado Ekiti main market after rainfall. #Ekiti
Protest at Oja Oba Ilorin. Traders block road over multiple taxes. #Ilorin
Accident involving bus at Control Post roundabout Owerri. #Owerri
Protest by okada riders at Nkwo Nnewi market junction. #Nnewi
Curfew announced after unrest at Monday Market Maiduguri. #Maiduguri
Serious traffic at Terminus Jos. Multiple accidents same spot. #Jos
Heavy rainfall don flood Aba-Owerri road. Cars stuck. #Aba
Trailer overturn at Apongbon bridge Lagos. FRSC on ground. #Lagos
